4243.title: Privacy policy has folding paragraphs which are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: The authors of Visible's privacy policy went through the extra effort to create folding paragraphs, where at first you only see the headings, and as a reader you can expand each one to see the full text.

7504.quoteText: Weâ€™d hate to see you go, but you may cancel service for any reason at any time.
7504.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
